welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Olivette, known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city's unique attractions and hidden gems. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport houses all major airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and features a few dining options and a duty-free shop.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is home to low-cost carriers and has a limited selection of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'STL Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport is reserved for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting the 'Belleville Airport WiFi' network and entering the provided password.
